root: ^Guard: OK sir, I am gonna take you to your cell now. If I may give you some advice, don't let anyone see you are afraid, and do not accept anything from anyone because they will want something in return.
^You do not want to be in debt in prison.
^I would suggest that you introduce yourself to your cell mate early, he is a character but he isn't the worst in here.
^Prick Guard: If they think about getting aggressive you gotta let them know who is in charge. You better learn quick or these animals will eat you alive.
^Nice Guard: Don't listen to him. Treat them as you wish to be treated yourself and they will behave better. A little respect goes a long way in here.
